title: Dark.Raid-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:
  
                          Dark Raid (c) Vector Games 

    Release Date :  5/2014                         Protection : Steam
    Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Action 

     

 
  Dark Raid is a Retro FPS Action game developed by an indie developer
  'Vector Games'.Dark Raid is a new concept of mixing good old-school FPS
  game styles and new generation graphics and game-play.Brace your selves
  to fight with sinister enemies and save the world! 

   

   
   - Extract
   - Burn or mount the .iso
   - Run setup.exe and install
   - Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
   - Start game once to detect your hardware
   - Start again to play
   
   NOTE:
   On first game start, it detects your hardware and quits
   back to desktop after the animation. Just restart and enjoy   
   
   Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
   online ..
